resources.string: Thank you for participating in the BATO study!
The aim of this app is to help people build the skills that researchers find helpful in feeling good.
Know the activities you do that make you feel good (or bad), and know the thoughts you think that make you feel good (or bad).
The ability to challenge negative thoughts
You will build these skills through a daily diary, daily mood graphs, the "Nab the Negative" and the "Destroyer Game".
write a positive thought to destroy the negative thought

If you were trying to act as your own attorney whose job was to defend yourself, and whether or not you went to jail depended on the truth of this negative thought, what would you say in your own defense?
If your friend called very upset and said this thought about himself/herself, what would you say to him/her?
How would this thought make you feel?
How much do you believe this thought

Personalizing
Shoulds

resources.string: See if the negative thought you entered corresponds to any of these common types of negative thinking.
Do you need a coping strategy?

string-array.name: add_event_user_category_descriptions
string-array.item: You assume what others think about you.
You predict the future will be negative.
You believe that if something bad happens it will be awful and unbearable.
You put negative labels on yourself and others.
You only think about the bad side of things.
You claim that the positive things you do are not important.
You think about things in black-and-white terms; e.g., good or bad, all or none.
You make conclusions about how things are based on one event.
You blame yourself for negative events.
You view things in term of how they "should" be, not how they are.
You compare yourself to others doing better than you.

string-array.name: add_event_user_coping_strategies_titles
string-array.item: Listen to music
Take a walk
Watch TV
Call a friend
Call family
Read a book
Knit
Squeeze a stressball
Exercise
Clean

resources.string: To unlock this game, populate your diary with daily thoughts!
To unlock this game, play \'Nab the Negative\' to generate challenging thoughts!
Your high score for this game is…
Select a category to challenge a negative thought from it.

string-array.name: capture_tutorial_instructions
string-array.item: Not all of the negative thoughts that we have are true.
You may think, \'I am stupid\', even though there\'s evidence against it.
Like the time you got a good grade on a test.
Or the time you did well on an interview.
But sometimes, coming up with the evidence against those negative thoughts is hard.
With this game, you will learn to challenge the truth of your negative thoughts.
You will do this by creating "CHALLENGER THOUGHTS".
Luckily for you, these challenger thoughts are equipped with tractor beams.
When you come up with enough challenger thoughts …
…they will take the negative thought to the \'Destroyer Game\'…
…where YOU will get rid of it!
To start, click on the type of thought you want to challenge.

string-array.name: destroyer_tutorial_instructions
string-array.item: Here, you can destroy your negative thoughts
A list of the all your challenger thoughts will display on the left.
Your task is to drag a challenger thought into the cannon and tap the screen where you want the challenger thought to go.
If it hits the negative thought, great job! You destroyed it.
If it doesn\'t, no worries, try again.
The game is over when the screen is filled with challenger thoughts!
